channel.title: Making item stackable
channel.description:
Like rune arrows if i do ::pickup 892 999 i get 999 rune arrows
but if i do ::pickup 7810 10 i get only of and if i do ::pickup 7810 10 again its going to another item slot.. do anybody know a tut to do this or know somebody how to fix it
please help
